attributes.action: repay the taxpayers £1000 each, for false and/or excessive expenses claims made by MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the taxpayers think it is outrageous that our MP's can make these ludicrous expenses claims while we suffer with the economic downturn and the rising cost of living. We propose that the government repays £1000 to each taxpayer as we feel our tax payments have not been correctly represented by the government

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
